This item is perfect for mages and champions who deal both magic and physical damage.
It provides bonuses to ability power, magic penetration, and ability haste, helping to increase damage and the frequency of ability usage.
The "Spellblade" effect allows you to deal bonus magic damage with your next attack after using an ability, adding burst damage and helping to quickly take down squishy enemies.
